intro1Text:
Tap your Nomi to the middle 
  back of another mobile device to
 share your profile 

 Make sure they have turned on NFC in settings
intro2Text:
Your Nomi QR Code can be 
 accessed through by selecting 
 Generate QR Code button
intro3Text:
Here is your exclusive QR Code 
 Share with your People
signintxt: You can use email to sign in or
specilizet: With Nomi Direct you can tap people direct to any app you choose
unlimitedtapst: Your Nomi is water proof and will work indefinitely with an unlimited number of taos.
privacyt: No Personal passwords are ever needed to link social accounts with Nomi!
name: Name
